name: Katrina Duncan
body:
### Welcome 
I'm Kitt, a freelance specialist-generalist. Providing support to creative, academic, and commercial ventures and individuals. Find me developing networks, writing code and making music somewhere between Berlin and London.

### Skillsets

Copywriting / Editing

Front-End Web Design / Site Maintenance

Virtual Assistance / Research

Event Support / Front of House

### Training and Experience

BA - Arts (Professional Writing/Literature)

CERT IV - Business

HTML/CSS 

### Portfolio
From blog posts and tweets to detailed manuals and marketing brochures. 

### Contact
Full CV and contact details upon request.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
